Title: Nirobin and the Office
Description:
Perhaps there is more to investigate, but I need time to go over our findings here first.

Our colleague, Nirobin, the one arcane projecting himself into the headquarters, should be ready for your assistance by now. He's got his own office at the Academy in Thaldraszus that he tends to squirrel himself away in.

I'm positive he'll be there... Mostly because he never leaves it.
ObjectivesText: Speak with Nirobin at his office in Thaldraszus.
